Title: Court restrains Rivers Assembly, CJ from impeaching Fubara, deputy
Summary: A Rivers State High Court in Oyibo Local Government Area, sitting in Port Harcourt, has issued an interim order of injunction against the Speaker of the Rivers State House of Assembly and 25 others, including the Clerk of the House and the Chief Judge of Rivers State, restraining them from proceeding with the impeachment move . Title: How to choose where to buy Mounjaro in Nigeria: 7 things to check
Summary: How to choose where to buy Mounjaro in Nigeria: 7 things to check . Not all suppliers of the popular medication are the same . The results people are seeing are impressive .

Title: Rivers crisis: Fubara’s aide cites budget dispute as impeachment looms
Summary: Darlington Orji cited Fubara’s refusal to present a supplementary budget as the crux of the political crisis rocking the state . Rivers State has been gripped by the crisis .

Title: Ogun govt assures adequate funding, logistics for measles–rubella campaign
Summary: The Ogun State Government has assured residents of adequate funding and logistics support for the forthcoming measles–rubella vaccination campaign . Title: Film adaptation of “The Secret Lives of Baba Segi’s Wives” set for release in December 2026
Summary: A film adaptation of The Secret Lives of Baba Segi’s Wives, the novel by Nigerian writer Lola Shoneyin, is scheduled for release in December 2026 .

Title: Imam Abubakar did what leaders failed to do — Obi
Summary: Obi said the Imam’s life stood as a stark reminder that true leadership is not defined by position or power . Obi said Imam Abubakar did what leaders failed to do — Obi .

Title: Impeachment: Fubara tried to influence constituents, Rivers Assembly lawmakers allege
Summary: Lawmakers in Rivers State House of Assembly have revealed what they describe as the real reason behind moves to impeach Governor Siminalayi Fubara and his deputy, Prof. Ngozi Odu, over alleged gross misconduct . According to Hon. Looloo Opuende, representing Akuku Toru Constituency 11

Title: Carrick seeks small steps to get Man Utd back on top
Summary: Michael Carrick believes European qualification from his short stint in charge of Manchester United will be evidence the Red Devils are moving in the right direction . Carrick seeks small steps to get Man Utd back on top .

Title: SDP National Chairman mourns Akwashiki, hails legacy of loyalty and service
Summary: The National Chairman of the Social Democratic Party (SDP), Professor Sadiq Umar Abububar, has described the death of Senator Godiya Akwashiki as a “great loss” to the party and the nation .

Title: Tinubu pays special tribute to Chief Bisi Akande at 87
Summary: President Tinubu said the former governor of Osun State's support for his administration is worthy of note . He paid special tribute to Chief Bisi Akande at 87 .

Title: NGF, HIIL sign MoU to advance people-centred justice reform
Summary: The Nigeria Governors’ Forum and the Hague Institute for Innovation of Law have signed a Memorandum of Understanding to establish a collaborative framework aimed at promoting people-centred justice across Nigeria . The MoU, aligned with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goal 16.3, aims to provide state governments with tools, training and innovative methods .

Title: Galaxy Backbone prioritises infrastructure, cybersecurity in Nigeria’s digital drive
Summary: Galaxy Backbone says it is placing renewed emphasis on digital infrastructure and cybersecurity as it marks two decades of supporting Nigeria’s public-sector digital systems . The company said its priorities remain the expansion of core infrastructure and the protection of government digital assets . It said it would formally mark its 20th anniversary in June 2026 .

Title: Osun PDP rejects NWC dissolution as group backs caretaker committee
Summary: The State Working Committee of the Peoples Democratic Party in Osun State has rejected its dissolution announced by the party’s National Working Committee in some states, including Osun . Title: Oyo alerts pensioners of gratuity extortion cartel
Summary: The Oyo State Government raised the alarm over allegations that some pensioners are being extorted by individuals posing as government officials in the course of processing gratuity payments . Title: Vaccinate children against measles, Imo urges parents
Summary: Executive Secretary of Imo State Primary Health Care Development Agency, Ms Kosilisochukwu Ekenjoku, made the appeal during a one-day sensitisation meeting with health stakeholders and groups on Friday .
